ai_choice.title: Apply to make change to a council flat - Cornwall - Choice
ai_choice.reason: The customer wants to make small changes to his flat and needs a simple online form to request permission, which aligns with the 'Home solutions' page that explains housing options and supports finding suitable properties.

ai_page.title: Apply to make change to a council flat - Cornwall - Page
ai_page.body:
Home solutions

We have lots of different housing solutions, services and advice to help you live safely and comfortably in your own home. These solutions apply to all types of housing, not just council-owned properties.

On this page

  • About your options
  • Living independently
  • Practical help at home
  • Financial support
  • Moving home
  • Contact us

About your options

If you or someone you know is finding it difficult to manage at home, there are a number of solutions that may help. These can range from simple home adaptations to joining community groups for support, or applying for financial help with daily living costs.

Living independently

  • Equipment to help with daily tasks
  • Community support groups
  • Assistive technology and alarms
  • Accessible and adapted accommodation

Practical help at home

  • Cleaning, shopping, and preparing meals
  • Home maintenance and gardening
  • Help with managing finances and paying bills

Financial support

  • Benefits and grants for independent living
  • Help with housing costs
  • Assistance with adaptations

Moving home

If it’s no longer possible to remain in your current home, options can include downsizing, supported or sheltered housing, or moving closer to family.

Contact us

For more information or advice about home solutions, please visit our housing page or speak to a member of our team.

ai_feedback.title: Apply to make change to a council flat - Cornwall - Feedback

points.question: Did the text answer your query?
points.answer: No, it didn't provide a clear step-by-step process for applying to make changes or how to request permission online.

points.question: Was there anything that could have been clearer?
points.answer: Yes, it should have included specific instructions or links for submitting the application and information on how updates are communicated.

points.question: Is there any way this text could be improved to make it easier for you to understand?
points.answer: Adding a dedicated section with a simple guide or FAQ about applying for flat improvements would help me understand exactly what to do and what to expect.

ai_issue.title: Apply to make change to a council flat - Cornwall - Issue

text_improvements.original:
About your options
  If you or someone you know is finding it difficult to manage at home, there are a number of solutions that may help. These can range from simple home adaptations to joining community groups for support, or applying for financial help with daily living costs.
text_improvements.issue: The lack of clear, actionable steps or links for applying or requesting permissions may cause confusion, highlighted by feedback asking for specific instructions.

text_improvements.original:
Contact us
  For more information or advice about home solutions, please visit our housing page or speak to a member of our team.
text_improvements.issue: The absence of direct contact details or a dedicated application process can result in uncertainty, contributing to the feedback about needing clearer guidance.

ai_improvement.title: Apply to make change to a council flat - Cornwall - Improvement

text_issues.Issue: The lack of clear, actionable steps or links for applying or requesting permissions may cause confusion, highlighted by feedback asking for specific instructions.
text_issues.original:
About your options
  If you or someone you know is finding it difficult to manage at home, there are a number of solutions that may help. These can range from simple home adaptations to joining community groups for support, or applying for financial help with daily living costs.
text_issues.improvement: Learn how to request permission online for flat improvements by visiting our dedicated application page, which provides step-by-step instructions and necessary forms.
text_issues.why: Providing a clear link and specific instructions directly addresses the feedback about needing guidance, making the application process easier to understand and follow.

text_issues.Issue: The absence of direct contact details or a dedicated application process can result in uncertainty, contributing to the feedback about needing clearer guidance.
text_issues.original:
Contact us
  For more information or advice about home solutions, please visit our housing page or speak to a member of our team.
text_issues.improvement: You can apply online or contact our housing team directly at [insert contact info or link], who can guide you through the flat improvement process and provide updates.
text_issues.why: Adding specific contact details or links helps users know exactly how to get assistance, reducing uncertainty and aligning with the need for transparent communication.

text_issues.Issue: The overview menu lacks specific links or guidance related to applying for flat changes, which might cause users like David to feel unsure about how to proceed with their requests.
text_issues.original:
On this page

    Practical help at home

text_issues.improvement: On this page, include a direct link titled 'Apply for Flat Improvements' that leads to the online application form or detailed guidance on submitting your request.
text_issues.why: Adding a clear, specific link improves navigation and ensures users understand exactly where to go to start their application, addressing confusion and improving user experience.
